    • Constructor Detail

      • HornerPolynomial

        public HornerPolynomial(double a0)
        Creates a constant polynomial. f(x) = a0.

      • HornerPolynomial

        public HornerPolynomial(double a1,
                        double a0)
        Creates a linear polynomial. f(x) = a1*x + a0.

      • HornerPolynomial

        public HornerPolynomial(double a2,
                        double a1,
                        double a0)
        Creates a quadratic polynomial. f(x) = a2*x^2 + a1*x + a0.

      • HornerPolynomial

        public HornerPolynomial(double a3,
                        double a2,
                        double a1,
                        double a0)
        Creates a cubic polynomial. f(x) = a3*x^3 + a2*x^2 + a1*x + a0.

      • HornerPolynomial

        public HornerPolynomial(double a4,
                        double a3,
                        double a2,
                        double a1,
                        double a0)
        Creates a biquadratic polynomial. f(x) = a4*x^4 + a3*x^3 + a2*x^2 + a1*x + a0.

      • HornerPolynomial

        public HornerPolynomial(double[] a)
        Creates a polynomial from an array of coefficients. f(x) = a[n]*x^n + ... + a[1]*x + a[0].
        Parameters:
        a - The array of coefficients. The leading coefficient a[n] occurs last in the array. The array is copied to insure immutability of the polynomial.

      • HornerPolynomial

        public HornerPolynomial(List<Double> list)
        Creates a polynomial from list of coefficients. f(x) = a[n]*x^n + ... + a[1]*x + a[0].
        Parameters:
        list - The list of coefficients. The leading coefficient a[n] occurs last in the list. The list contents are copied to insure immutability of the polynomial.
